name: Prisoner (itch) (uhqqoW)
description:
Hello! I decided to share my all projects who I "finished" during my half-year journey of learning programming and Unity from scratch. 

So this is my last "finished" project in my gamedev adventure.  There was plenty others but I've not finished them. 

Game is typical platformer. You need to escape prison (that was the idea) and you must avoid spikes and find keys to doors. 

RECOMMENDED TO PLAY IN FULLSCREEN!

In the future I want to post there more of my future finished (I hope so)  projects. 

Have fun and leave comment!

You can check my others projects later.
